channel.title: Index Cards by Ron
channel.description:
Here's a useful script for studying. It's unfinished and all my ideas were left in the script. Hope you like it. [img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/9693/icfsbyronv02.png[/img] Script is attached with the study text file I used to generate the flash cards. If you want to make your own, all you do is setup a text file with the following:
## this is the 1st flash card Q=What's Ron's sign? A=Scorpio ## 2nd flash card Q=How tall is Ron? A=5'11" ## 3rd flash card Q=What's a weenus? A=The skin on your elbow
~Ron

item.title: Index Cards by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

SETO:

Neet, thanks it might come in handy, btw seems like you are dead?/? few years ago you were very active

That was when i was in high school enjoying scripting with a very active scar community. Most of the community has dispersed and left for other macroing programs. I still program every now and then when i get a chance.

R.I.P RSC:

Looks nice! I don’t have much to study now, but it might come in handy someday. GJ!

Thanks, I figure it will help people when the summer is over. It helped me study for my finals.

~Ron

Read full topic
